ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:09:06 [Issue ID 4000-28692] urn:comicvine:4000-28692 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 13:16:46. [Issue ID 43485]
ComicInfo.Summary:
The super-villain and drug trafficker, the Garbage Man, is angry that Trash allowed a crack house to be destroyed (issue #31). He tasks Trash with finding Power Pack and destroying them. Trash succeeds in disabling all four members of the Pack and rendering them unconscious. However, when the Garbage Man goads them to kill the Pack, they balk, realizing that they're children. They wake Power Pack, and team up with them to defeat the Garbage Man.
Afterward, the Pack implore Trash not to be villains anymore. Trash retorts that the Power children - who are affluent and well cared-for - simply do not understand what they need to do to survive.
ComicInfo.Title: Who's the Villain?
ComicInfo.Writer: Louise Jones Simonson,Louise Simonson,John Figueroa,Louise Simonson,John Figueroa
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved By the Comics Code Authority
